original: intros H1 H2. apply is_pseries_ext with (a0 := PS_plus a b) (b0 := fun n => plus (scal (pow_n x n) (a n)) (scal (pow_n x n) (b n))) (x0 := x) (l := plus la lb). - intro n. unfold PS_plus. rewrite scal_distr_l. reflexivity. - apply is_series_plus with (la0 := la) (lb0 := lb). ++ apply H1. ++ apply H2.
